text: Skoob is a Social media for readers in Brazil, launched in January 2009 by Lindenberg Moreira. The network allows for interaction with other social medias, such as Facebook and Twitter, as well as popular stores in Brazil. Skoob's name comes from the English word "books" spelled backwards. On January 27, 2012, a survey was made that says that Skoob had more than 1,200,000 users. == References == Category:Social networking
title: Skoob
